columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.description: The path of the file.

columns.description: The cloud verdict for the file.

columns.description: The mode of mitigation applied.

columns.description: The operating system type of the agent.

columns.name: AgentInfected
columns.description: Indicates whether the agent is infected.

columns.description: The unique identifier for the initiating user.

columns.name: Engines
columns.description: Details of the engines used.

columns.name: FileExtensionType

columns.name: MitigationStatus

columns.name: AgentDomain
columns.description: The domain of the agent.

columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the record was created.

columns.description: Indicates whether the certificate is valid.

columns.description: Indicates whether the issue was automatically resolved.
